title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 75.1 - Duties in respect to receipts and disbursements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 75.1 - Duties in respect to receipts and disbursements

State Regulations

The memorandum of the receipt or disbursement of moneys by
a police justice of a village or by a justice of the peace of a town, required
by the said statutes in lieu of the issue of a receipt for moneys paid to such
a justice or in lieu of the taking of a receipt for moneys disbursed by such a
justice, shall be an entry upon the page or pages of the docket upon which are
recorded matters in respect to the action or proceeding in relation to which
the moneys were received or disbursed, and shall set forth: (a) The date of the receipt or
disbursement, (b) The amount
received or disbursed, (c) The name
of the person from whom the money was received or to whom the money was paid, and
(d) A brief statement of the
purpose for which the money was paid to or disbursed by the justice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
75.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
